E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1990
Subject: Progress of Todd Jones
Dear Sir,
Todd Jones is doing pretty good at A Modesto A's!
He has an ERA of 2.82, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1990
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Juan Samuel



Date: Thursday, 7/3/1990
Subject: Tom Goodwin healing process
Tom Goodwin is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
